name: Static Harm
description:
You are Harm and your job is to steal a top secret package.

You have people on the inside of the enemy base, and they are gonna get it for you. And you then have to sneak inside and steal it, or just... you know... kill them all. 

You will have to fight through hordes of people with "the best AI ever known to man" (it's a joke, don't take it seriously, I mean the AI, not the game, but the game isn't good enough either, so just... I don't. You do what you think is the best).
